akas: The Affair: Una relazione pericolosa Italy
akas from release info: The Affair: Una relazione pericolosa Italy

1.title: Episode #4.1
1.plot: Helen and Noah have moved following Vik's job offer, and they're butting heads more than ever. Meanwhile, a flash-forward scene with Noah and Cole indicates that someone is missing and that there have been a string of intense events leading up to that moment.

2.title: Episode #4.2
2.plot: Cole contemplates important business desicions; Louisa is frustrated about her being undocumented; Alison meets Ben.

3.title: Episode #4.3
3.plot: Noah's attempt to teach his students a lesson in civil duty spirals out of control. Helen can't handle Vik's decision and goes behind his back, only to find resistance everywhere she turns.

4.title: Episode #4.4
4.plot: Alison and Ben dig into her past and begin confronting her fears. Cole's relationship with Alison is jeopardizing his marriage to Luisa.

5.title: Episode #4.5
5.plot: Vik must face the reality of his illness which makes him see his life in a new light and leads to unexpected experiences. Cole is following his father's journey and at the end he finds the answers he was looking for.

6.title: Episode #4.6
6.plot: Noah is finding his place as a teacher but cannot make peace with his son, Trevor. Alison has hard times to discover the truth about her father and her new boyfriend, Ben and makes a surprise journey where she gets the best advice from the person she least expected.

7.title: Episode #4.7
7.plot: Helen goes to the desert with Sierra; While helping Anton, Noah's relationship with Janelle strengthens.

8.title: Episode #4.8
8.plot: Cole, Noah, and Anton go on the road to find missing Alison.

9.title: Episode #4.9
9.plot: After Alison comes back from LA, knowing what she knows about Ben, they have the inevitable talk.

10.title: Episode #4.10
10.plot: Noah and Anton visit Princeton where Noah encounters an old friend. An immensely difficult day forces Cole and Luisa to reexamine their relationship.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Noah, a husband, father, teacher and writer, meets Allison, a local waitress, at a beach town restaurant he visits with his family.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: As the Butler state readies for the annual summer party, Noah can't escape the allure of the mysterious Alison. She, meanwhile, bends under the emotional debt owed to her mother-in-law. But as aspects of their separate lives start to weave together, the two are forced to consider an inevitability.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Noah's interest in Alison is intensified by conflicts with his in-laws. Alison tends a mysterious injury to her leg and hints at her family's links to Montauk's sordid past.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: When Noah and Alison visit the remote Block Island and give in to their feelings for one another, they quickly learn that intimacy can be a double-edged sword.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: As passions flare behind closed doors, Alison and Noah are forced to confront new obstacles at home. Alison gets a surprise visit from her estranged mother, Athena, while Noah struggles with the behavior of his daughter, Whitney.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Noah learns that there is more to Alison than he knows.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: The Solloways return to Brooklyn; Cole confronts Alison when things hit close to home

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Distracted by her burgeoning small business, Helen tasks Noah with representing the family at a literary award ceremony for her father, Bruce. A chance encounter with Alison and her grandmother leads to an uncomfortable truth.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: While Noah comes clean to Helen about what he wants for the future, Alison spirals towards a reckoning.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: The disappearance of Whitney causes Helen and Noah equal friction once she finds out where she is and what exactly happened... Meanwhile, Cole searches for answers as he tries to forget the past, along with Alison! All this as Det. Jeffries inches closer to his number one suspect.

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: As Noah and Helen start divorce proceedings, Helen tries to move on with a new man.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Alison's summer with Noah is interrupted. Cole's lifestyle causes concern.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: Noah's unrestrained love for Alison has serious consequences. Meanwhile, Alison discovers a surprising truth about how to sustain a marriage.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: As pressures in Helen's life mount, one innocent mistake leads to outrageous consequences. Meanwhile, a court order presents a dire setback for Noah and Alison.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: Alison's eyes are opened when she discovers how Noah has characterized her in his novel. She searches for him at the brownstone, where Helen delivers a poignant message. She retreats to Montauk, where she reconnects with Cole. Unbeknownst to her, Cole has made a platonic connection with a new character, Luisa, which we can see has potential to become more. In a flash forward, Noah's attorney receives a tip about Scotty's murder from an unlikely source.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Helen and Noah's divorce proceedings are interrupted by an emergency, while Alison tells Noah she wants to stay with her mother at the Sousanna Institute.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: Alison confronts Noah about his book. Revelations further alienate Cole.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: On the college campus where they first met, Helen is amazed to see Noah in a new role, and bewildered by Whitney's future plans. Meanwhile, Noah is in danger of spinning out of control as his fame and related temptations escalate.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Alison embarks on a journey; Helen receives some unexpected attention; Cole is pushed to the edge.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: Noah grapples with essential questions. Alison begins to doubt a recent ambition - and renewed interactions with the Lockhart brothers force her to consider a harrowing possibility.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: Cole and Luisa take a serious step forward. Meanwhile, a series of revelations cause Noah to reconsider everything he thought he knew about Alison - and a momentous decision Alison makes may just end their relationship.

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: The truth about the fatal night is finally revealed, what happened and why? In the current time-line, Noah is forced to make a decision.

1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: Haunted by recent hardship, Noah struggles to navigate the challenges of his old life while attempting to adapt to a new one. A new love interest isn't enough to overcome a sense of dread. Someone is watching him. Season premiere.

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot: Noah delivers a stern request to Helen; Alison finds her worst fears realised.

3.title: Episode #3.3
3.plot: Juliette finds Noah an alluring prospect, but a terrifying event shatters all hope of an easy affair.

4.title: Episode #3.4
4.plot: Cole finds himself in a difficult situation. Allison looks to reconnect with her daughter.

5.title: Episode #3.5
5.plot: Alison spends a day with a wistful Noah on Block Island, just as he finds his problems returning full-force.

6.title: Episode #3.6
6.plot: Compelled to return to a place he's spent his life trying to escape, Noah attempts to repair his relationship with Martin.

7.title: Episode #3.7
7.plot: Helen helps Noah, but at what cost? A vital moment of release turns suddenly into something that can't be undone.

8.title: Episode #3.8
8.plot: An unexpected cause to celebrate provokes a sobering realisation in Alison. Soon thereafter, a startling warning leaves her pondering the unthinkable.

9.title: Episode #3.9
9.plot: Helen brings to light some home truths to her family while Noah realises things are not always what they seem

10.title: Episode #3.10
10.plot: Noah's visit to Paris provides Juliette with a distraction from the realities at home, but a subsequent tragedy brings her true priorities into sharp focus.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: At once deeply observed and intriguingly elusive, The Affair explores the emotional effects of an extramarital relationship. Noah is a New York City schoolteacher and budding novelist with a wife of twenty years and four children. Alison is a young waitress and wife from Montauk at the end of Long Island, trying to piece her life back together in the wake of a tragedy. The provocative drama unfolds separately from multiple perspectives, using the distinct memory biases of each character to tell the story. Created by Sarah Treem.
imdb.title: The Affair
plot: A struggling novelist and a young waitress strike up an extramarital relationship that promises to forever change the course of their lives.::Noah Orent

At once deeply observed and intriguingly elusive, _The Affair_ (qv) explores the emotional effects of an extramarital relationship. Noah is a New York City schoolteacher and budding novelist with a wife of twenty years and four children. Alison is a young waitress and wife from Montauk at the end of Long Island, trying to piece her life back together in the wake of a tragedy. The provocative drama unfolds separately from multiple perspectives, using the distinct memory biases of each character to tell the story. Created by Sarah Treem.
synopsis: At once deeply observed and intriguingly elusive, THE AFFAIR explores the emotional effects of an extramarital relationship. Noah is a New York City schoolteacher and novelist who is happily married, but resents his dependence on his wealthy father-in-law. Alison is a young waitress trying to piece her life and marriage back together in the wake of a tragedy. The provocative drama unfolds when Alison and Noah meet in Montauk at the end of Long Island.

camera: Arri Alexa, Panavision PVintage and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
